subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_00A6_01C9DEE8.0F6FBD90
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

The only way I would ever "help" a ghost is by telling it that it has the p=
ower to find a way out the predicament itself.

  ----- Original Message --=
--- 
  From: Steve Hill 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, =
May 27, 2009 4:18 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville=
 WV






  We all have our own beliefs. I make no judgements on the living=
 or the dead. I just communicate and record. I am an Empath, not a priest. =
Many,many spirits have asked me for help. If they can help themselves, they=
 do not seem to know how. The prisoners believe that they would be trapped.=
 if they died there. Are they imprisoned by their own beliefs?
  Steve




=
---------------------------------------------------------------------------=
---
  From: April Abercrombie <april@...>
  To: EV=
P-ITC@yahoogroups.com
  Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 5:58:19 PM
  Subject:=
 Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV



  In a way, I agree. "St=
uck" implies accidental. If a ghost is hanging around, it there by choice, =
whether it is fully aware of that or not.

    ----- Original Message -----=
 
    From: Frank Sumption 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
    Sent: Wed=
nesday, May 27, 2009 3:55 PM
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at M=
oundsville WV



     I don't believe in trapped/lost souls, I think that's=
 Hollywood. The trouble with doing investigations, I think, is you get the =
evidence you expect to get, so it will tend to support the concept of stuck=
 souls. When I record it supports my concept of sprits travel, and haunting=
s are for show. Which is correct?--both at one time or another. 

     I di=
d a recording at lunch time, at home, and in it a voice says "ghost--right =
behind you". I was recording open air with the test board running.  

     =
Frank-S


    On Wed, May 27, 2009 at 1:54 PM, <SnowfireL@aol. com> wrote:
=





      Well, stand outside the thing, and help those poor souls out, he=
re they are making money at the cost of lost souls who are asking for help.=
  Shame on them, don't they realize  how many lost souls there are out ther=
e, waiting, go back (a few thousand years worth of them,)  were I to name a=
ll the tribes, country, religions, throughout the years, people that died t=
rapped, in various places over century's, and yes there are thousand's of t=
hem in the world, just dwelling in a cell of their own making, no progressi=
on, no light, no hope, without people they love, and who wait still loving =
them, they exist in these dark places without God.  This mission should be =
to help them get back to God, back to the light of God, light of Universe h=
owever, we want to call it, but in that light is love and happiness.  Just =
my take, sf

      In a message dated 5/27/2009 3:42:33 P.M. Eastern Daylig=
ht Time, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:




        Yes, you need spec=
ial permission. I was there for an all night ghost hunt as a guest of Easte=
rn Paranormal. The place can be rented at night but believe me when I say "=
it ain't cheap". Plus I don't think the prison would appreciate me releasin=
g the inmates before their eternal sentence has been served..
        Steve=





----------------------------------------------------------------------=
--
        From: "SnowfireL@aol. com" <SnowfireL@aol. com>

        To: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups .com

        Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 2:31:57 PM 

 =
       Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV




        =
Does one need special permission to get in there?  You folks should go back=
, and release them since a few of them already know you Steve, this is Stev=
e?  Right?  sf

        In a message dated 5/27/2009 2:15:10 P.M.. Eastern =
Daylight Time, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:




          Unfortunat=
ely I did not get to attempt to cross them. After my demonstration, another=
 group that was also there started complaining that the box made too much n=
oise and was hendering their investigation so I turned it off. I wouldn't w=
ant my direct communication with the deceased inmates to mess up their EVP =
work, now would I? I apoligized and put it away for the rest of the night.
=
           According to the prison staff, the inmates firmly believed that =
if they died in prison their souls would be forever trapped there. This bel=
ief was so strong that the prison officials would take the elderly inmates =
who were dying of natural causes to a local hospital so they would'nt have =
to die in the prison. Maybe their beliefs were well founded.     




-----=
-----------------------------------------------------------------
         =
 From: "SnowfireL@aol. com" <SnowfireL@aol. com>

          To: EVP-ITC@yah=
oogroups .com

          Sent: Wednesday, May 27, 2009 12:36:12 PM 

      =
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ghost Box Demo at Moundsville WV




          T=
his is a wonderful recording, were you able to free any of them?  So sad to=
 see them still there behind bars, must be very lonely for them, they shoul=
d be moving on so, they can start to work on making up for things on the ot=
her side.  You folks should go up there again, and hold a small prayer vigi=
l for them, of course they would no longer be ghosts trapped there, but the=
re are plenty more around. sf

          In a message dated 5/27/2009 12:10=
:56 P.M. Eastern Daylight Time, foreverhaunted57@ yahoo.com writes:



    =
        I was invited to spend the night in the West Virginia Penitentiary =
this past weekend... I was asked to give a short demonstration with my Opti=
mus 12-797 hacked radio. Deep inside the prison surrounded by concrete and =
steel, the radio could not pick up any radio stations in manual mode. I was=
n't sure how this might effect the demonstration. I was pleasantly surprise=
d with the results. I recorded the session and the results can be heard at =
this link. http://www.youtube. com/watch? v=3DKwDYu4RULlk
